lead_paragraph: The company said it had received 39 reports from users complaining about heat and distortion of the shape of their computers.
snippet: The company said it had received 39 reports from users complaining about heat and distortion of the shape of their computers.

headline.main: Sony Offers a Fix to Prevent Vaio Laptops’ Overheating
headline.seo: Sony Offers a Fix to Prevent  Vaio Laptops’  Overheating
headline.print_headline: Sony Offers a Fix to Prevent Vaio Laptops’ Overheating
